steps.title: share your song
steps.body: One can share their music to various file formats. The first step is to save the song.

steps.title: Save song
steps.body: open the menu on the right side of the screen and click on the save button (the button is a floppy disk). You can also change the name of your song by clicking on the title next to the save button and changing the text.

steps.title: Share song
steps.body: Next click on the share button on the same menu. From there a window will pop up. You can choose how you want to share the song in this window.
